general.archiveTips: Set as archived. Archived item cannot be exported to Portal, but will still work for Portal that already have it set.
general.error404Subtitle: Sorry, but the page you were looking for could not be found.
general.name: Name
general.noResultSubtitle: There aren't any results for that query
general.supportText: Write and describe your issue to us at

products.emptySubtitle: Products are what you sell to customers. They can be anything from physical goods to digital services.
products.nameTips: Products are the goods or services you sell. If you sell subscriptions, you might call them 'plans'. Product names are visible to customers at checkout, in receipts, and invoices.
products.notFoundSubtitle: The specified product does not exist.
products.title: Products

prices.descriptionTips: Price descriptions can help you stay organised. They're not customer-facing.
prices.emptySubtitle: Adding a price lets you sell this product to customers.
prices.notFoundSubtitle: The specified price does not exist.
prices.packagePricingTips: Select package pricing if you charge by the package, or group of units. For example, say you charge MYR 25.00 for every 5 units. Purchases are rounded up by default, so a customer buying 8 units would pay MYR 50.00.
prices.roundDown: Partial groups will be rounded down and billed as a complete group.
prices.roundUp: Partial groups will be rounded up and billed as a complete group.
prices.standardPricingTips: Select standard pricing if you charge the same price for each unit.
prices.title: Prices

users.emailGetStartedSubtitle: Receive helpful tips when you try out new {_brand} products
users.resetPasswordLinkInvalid: This password reset link has expired
users.reauthenticateSubtitle: Please confirm your password to continue.
users.resetSubtitle: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
users.resetSuccessTitle: Thanks, check your email for instructions to reset your password
users.resetSuccessSubtitle: Didn't get the email? Check your spam folder.
users.registerConsent: Get email from {_brand} about product updates, industry news and events. If you change your mind, you can unsubscribe any time.
users.languageSubtitle: Select a preferred language for your Dashboard, including date, time and number formatting
users.verifyEmailLinkInvalid: This verify email link has expired

validation.accountExists: An account already exists with this email address. If you'd like to create a new {_brand} account with the same email address,
validation.accountNotFound: We couldn't find that email. Please try again.
validation.emailInvalid: The @:general.email field must be a valid email
validation.passwordInvalid: The @:general.password field must be at least 10 characters
validation.passwordHint: Your password needs to be at least 10 characters, include multiple words and phrases to make it more secure.
validation.reauthenticationRequired: Please log in again to complete this action
